How to Use
  1. 1Select the AI model you're using from the dropdown
  2. 2Paste your text or prompt into the input area
  3. 3View estimated token count in real-time
  4. 4Check the cost estimate for your usage
  5. 5Adjust your prompt to fit within token limits
Pro Tips
  • •GPT-4 averages ~4 characters per token
  • •Code uses more tokens than plain English
  • •Keep prompts under 75% of max for response room
  • •Longer context = higher costs but better results

All processing happens in your browser. Your data never leaves your device.
